name: Malaysian Mobile
content:
/*
 * General format: +60        1X/11X            XXXXXXX
 *                 +(country) (provider prefix) (subscriber number)
 * - Provider codes start with 0 and are either 3 or 4 digits
 * - Leading zero in provider codes are dropped if country code is included
 * - Subscriber numbers never start with 1 and may be 7 or 8 digits long
 *
 * For more info, see http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Telephone_numbers_in_Malaysia
 */
+60122345678
+60132345678
+60142345678
+60152345678
+601111234567
+601122345678
author: Abu Bakar Al-Idrus
